name: sample-app
description: A sample application within the live-lambda workspace.

scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified for sample-app package" && exit 1
scripts.deploy: cd infrastructure && AWS_PROFILE=boundless-development AWS_REGION=us-west-1 pnpm exec cdk deploy SampleInfrastructureStack --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:live: cd infrastructure && AWS_PROFILE=boundless-development AWS_REGION=us-west-1 pnpm exec cdk deploy SampleInfrastructureStack -c liveLambdaActive=true --require-approval never
